metadata.name: Safe
metadata.description: A source preset for the Randomizer. Meant to mimic the complexity of the original game by having nine layers of complexity. Requires no speedrun or glitch knowledge for completion.
author: 3snow_p7im
setz
soba

goals: Holy glasses + Heart of Vlad + Tooth of Vlad + Rib of Vlad + Ring of Vlad + Eye of Vlad
